rows.label: qst650502_msg0001
rows.name: Gah-!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0002
rows.name: What is this place?!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0003
rows.name: Are... Are you okay?!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0004
rows.name: You're...not Prone...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0005
rows.name:
Uh, yeah, about that... What is that word
you're using, "Prone"? You're saying it
like it's a race, or something...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0006
rows.name:
I know Gulan, Superbians,
Luxurian and so forth, but
I've never heard of a "Prone"...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0007
rows.name:
Nor do I, I'm afraid. I do not
recall ever hearing of them.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0008
rows.name:
But until just a moment ago,
you looked just like Prone...
Just like my mortal enemies...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0009
rows.name:
I thought this was a battle simulation.
You're telling me it's all real? Was
this that trader's plan all along...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0010
rows.name: Friend very perceptive!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0011
rows.name: Whoa! Where'd he come from?!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0012
rows.name:
Friend sound startled like 10-ton gorilla
with fancy name appear from nowhere and
start playing electric guitar.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0013
rows.name:
Mr. Archsage, respectfully... So
it was you that arranged this?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0014
rows.name:
Indeedy-doodle! Nopon Archsage
capable of do almost anything
in pursuit of entertainment!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0015
rows.name: That's a weird thing to boast about...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0016
rows.name:
I did wonder why a run-of-the-mill
trader was calling himself the
"Nopon Archsage"...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0017
rows.name:
And anyway, what kind of
strange tech did you put
in that battle simulator?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0018
rows.name:
Oh, nothing much... Just little trick
for spirit away consciousness of Elma
to this here Land of Challenge.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0019
rows.name:
So my real self is still in
New LA, inside the simulator?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0020
rows.name:
Very much yes. I glad we
sort this out so quickly.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0021
rows.name:
You said it's my consciousness, but
it feels like my whole essence is
here... What's your end-goal...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0022
rows.name:
Very good question! Answer is simple -
to realize ambition of Nopon Archsage
and make lifelong dream come true!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0023
rows.name: Dream? What dream?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0024
rows.name:
Could it be...to make Elma, and me,
and you, Rex, meet face-to-face?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0025
rows.name:
It is as Shulk say! Is dream
of everyone to see Shulk and
Elma in one place together!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0026
rows.name:
Who the heck is the "everyone"
in that sentence...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0027
rows.name:
I can't believe this. All the
machinations, just for this...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0028
rows.name:
...No. I forget myself. First, I
should apologize to all of you.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0029
rows.name:
I mistook you for enemies and attacked
without provocation. The fault lies with
me entirely. I hope you can forgive it.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0030
rows.name:
Relax, there's nothing to
overlook! It was all just
a big misunderstanding.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0031
rows.name: My name's Rex. What's yours?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0032
qst650502_msg0033
rows.name:
Uhh... So what you're saying
is, you're...a Blade?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0034
rows.name: Oh, um, yes... You know about BLADEs?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0035
rows.name:
Know about them? Dear
madam, we are Blades!
Blades, and Drivers, that is.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0036
rows.name:
Wait, wait. What does driving
have to do with it...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0037
rows.name:
But only Hana is artificial
Blade! Please to remember!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0038
rows.name: N-no, hold on, I'm getting confused...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0039
rows.name:
It appears to me that the word
"Blade" may have different meanings
in Rex's and Elma's worlds...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0040
rows.name: But that exactly why it so delightful!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0041
rows.name:
Right, let's get things straight
then. In my world, "BLADE"
indicates the organization.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0042
rows.name:
And in yours, it's a...species?
Race? Is that correct?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0043
rows.name:
You're not a million Divine
Beastpeds off, but you're
not quite on the money...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0044
rows.name:
When a person touches a Core Crystal,
the life form that is born in that
instant, that is a Blade.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0045
rows.name:
A life form born from a
crystal, then...? And they
come in all different shapes?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0046
rows.name:
Hey, Elma... I've noticed
you're not surprised at
Gramps and Byakko speaking.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0047
rows.name:
Right, well... Maybe I'm just
used to it. Many different
races call Mira home...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0048
rows.name:
Weirder still, we can all communicate
freely. Some ascribe it to conscious
interference by some unknown party...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0049
rows.name:
Your planet, Mira... It's the first
time I'm hearing about it. Your world
certainly seems different from ours.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0050
rows.name:
The Bionis and Alst were
relatively similar in comparison.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0051
rows.name:
Definitely! At first I just thought
you guys came from some humanoid
Divine Beast that I'd never heard of.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0052
rows.name:
Hold on. There's something
I want to check.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0053
rows.name:
Wh-what is problem...? Why friend
Elma looking at Tora like Tora
eat Elma's breakfast...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0054
rows.name:
Don't you dare say that like it's
not something you'd ever do, Tora.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0055
rows.name:
But Tora just meet Elma! When Tora
have time to go to other world
and eat someone's breakfast?!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0056
rows.name:
The speech pattern definitely matches...
You said your name was Tora? Are you
friends with a Nopon called Tatsu...?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0057
rows.name: Mo-mo-mo-mo?!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0058
rows.name:
That absurd! Tora not have
any friends called Tatsu!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0059
rows.name:
Hm... Fine, then. It seems
I've got the wrong Nopon.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0060
rows.name:
The Tora I know was smaller,
anyway. And a far sweeter child...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0061
rows.name:
Memeh... Tora cop to being larger than
most Nopon his age, but never thought
sweetness would be put to question...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0062
rows.name:
Easy there, Tora... I know it's a sore
subject, but we really need to hurry
this conversation along, all right?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0063
rows.name:
You pronounce it "No-pon"? Over here,
we say it with a short vowel... Are
the creatures themselves similar?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0064
rows.name:
The appearance and mannerisms are
the same. I can't really see any
major differences on the whole...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0065
rows.name:
Well. It might support the hypothesis that
my world is different somehow... And it
might be a little late to say, but...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0066
rows.name:
Rex, and you, Shulk... I'm ready to
accept that you and yours are not
simply virtual simulator entities.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0067
rows.name:
Well, that's a relief! And it's just
a step away from being friends.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0068
rows.name:
Homura's right! After all, it
didn't take us long to ally with
Homura and her friends, either.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0069
rows.name: Yes, I certainly get that impression...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0070
rows.name:
Mo mo! This exactly the scene that
Archsage write so many stories about
and post to Avaritia notice board!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0071
rows.name:
For an Archsage, he's sure got
some kiddy-like dreams, eh?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0072
rows.name: You could say that again...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0073
rows.name: You not make fun of dreams of Archsage!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0074
rows.name:
Dream of Archsage is chance for
friends! Great chance to earn much
experience and get awesome loot!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0075
rows.name:
That is an enticing proposition...
but I do have my duties as a
BLADE colonel to perform.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0076
rows.name:
I can't afford to spend hours
on end stuck in a simulator.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0077
rows.name:
That is problem that is barely problem!
Nopon Archsage have already tweak
relative timestream flow rate setting.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0078
rows.name:
For one day that pass in this
realm, time elapsed on Mira is
precisely 270 milliseconds.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0079
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] "Milliseconds"...? Did he
just make up a unit there?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0080
rows.name:
In other words, I could spend an
entire year here, and only lose
ten seconds on the other side?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0081
rows.name:
Just so! Perfect for training self!
Also, Archsage deeply impressed by
arithmetic skills. No need to train those.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0082
rows.name:
Yes, I can appreciate the
usefulness. And, er... Thank you?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0083
rows.name:
So, what Rex think? Want to
borrow strength of Elma, just
like did with Shulk and Fiorung?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0084
rows.name: Make Elma your ally

rows.label: qst650502_msg0085
rows.name: Leave Elma be

rows.label: qst650502_msg0101
rows.name:
Of course! You can never
have too many friends!

rows.label: qst650502_msg0102
rows.name:
...Then it's decided. From now
on, I'll be at your command.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0103
rows.name: Looking forward to it, Team Rex.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0201
rows.name:
Uhm, well... It sounds great
in theory, but we don't really
know Elma that well yet...

rows.label: qst650502_msg0202
rows.name:
I think mutual understanding comes
with time. Fighting side by side is
the best way to get to know someone.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0203
rows.name: I... I guess so?

rows.label: qst650502_msg0204
rows.name:
...Then it's decided. From now on,
I'll be at your command. Looking
forward to it, Team Leader Rex.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0205
rows.name: And you, too...teammates.

rows.label: qst650502_msg0206
rows.name: What will you do?
